errors.error_description: The URL for the installation documentation contains an incorrect path segment ('install/installation.html' instead of 'install/index.html').
Used pip install with conda-specific --channel parameter which is invalid syntax
Added unnecessary pip dependencies (cmake, numpy, setuptools) when using conda pre-built binaries
correction_candidates: $ conda install --channel=numba llvmlite cmake numpy setuptools

$ conda install --channel=numba llvmlite
   $ conda install cmake numpy setuptools
$ pip install llvmlite cmake numpy setuptools

errors.error_description: Added contradictory installation requirements mentioning LLVM 15.x.x and Python 2.7 which conflicts with earlier compatibility statements
correction_candidates: Remove the entire 'Installation Requirements' section as it contradicts the compatibility information already provided
Before installing llvmlite, you must first install LLVM 14.x.x and ensure Python 3.9+ compatibility is maintained
Before installing llvmlite, ensure your system meets the Python 3.9 -- 3.12 and LLVM 14.x.x requirements mentioned above
Before installing llvmlite, you must first install the latest version of LLVM 16.x.x and ensure Python 3.12+ compatibility
errors.golden_answer: Remove the entire 'Installation Requirements' section as it contradicts the compatibility information already provided
